titles: The pernicious way of the rigid presbyter and antichristian ministers detected and several weighty matters (in controversie, betwixt Sion and her adversaires, or between the true church and the false) discussed : to inform both magistrates, ministers, and people,
author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to George Whitehead. cf. NUC pre-1956.
keywords: Caffyn, Matthew, 1628-1714. --  Faith in God's promises.
